description:
There's one thing Tommy hates, and that's a thief!

When the mellow hunk found Phenix Saint rummaging through his wallet the other day, it's lucky for that he didn't completely flip out. Instead, he gave Phenix two choice; either go to jail or suck his cock.

Which would you choose? Exactly! Phenix went with option #2 and sucked Tommy off.

Enjoy!
title: Dealing With A Thief
